title: Brabazon: king of the air
brief_description: A report on the building of the giant, eight-engine Brabazon air liner, from its conception as an idea to the time of its flight in Septpember 1949. Commentary by John Mills.
description: A report on the building of the giant, eight-engine Brabazon air liner, from its conception as an idea to the time of its flight in Septpember 1949. Commentary by John Mills.
